mapper.sql: rid, uid, lid, reperiods, rexpiretime, rmoney, rtime, rtype, rstate
mapper.insert:
insert into repayment
rid,
uid,
lid,
reperiods,
rexpiretime,
rmoney,
rtime,
rtype,
rstate,

mapper.update:
update repayment
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lid = #{lid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reperiods = #{reperiods,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rexpiretime = #{rexpiretime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
rmoney = #{rmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
rtime = #{rtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
rtype = #{rtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rstate = #{rstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where rid = #{rid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update repayment set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lid = #{lid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reperiods = #{reperiods,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rexpiretime = #{rexpiretime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rmoney = #{rmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rtime = #{rtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rtype = #{rtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rstate = #{rstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where rid = #{rid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
